HtmlText Module¶

class epyk.core.html.HtmlText.BlockQuote(report, text, author, color, width, height, htmlCode, helper, options, profile)¶
class epyk.core.html.HtmlText.Fieldset(report, legend, width, height, helper, options, profile)¶
property options¶

Property to set all the possible object for a button

Return type

OptText.OptionsText

class epyk.core.html.HtmlText.Highlights(report, text, title, icon, type, color, width, height, htmlCode, helper, profile)¶
class epyk.core.html.HtmlText.Label(report, text, color, align, width, height, htmlCode, tooltip, profile, options)¶
click(jsFncs, profile=False)¶

Add a click event for a component

The event will be automatically added to the onload section to be activated once the component has been build

Example select.label.click(str(rptObj.js.console.log(“test”)))

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/js/js_htmldom_eventlistener.asp

https://www.w3schools.com/jsref/event_onload.asp

Parameters

  • jsFncs – An array of Js functions or string. Or a string with the Js

  • profile –

Returns

The htmlObj

property id_html¶

Related Pages:

https://developer.mozilla.org/fr/docs/Web/API/Element/getElementsByTagName

Returns

property options¶

Property to set all the possible object for a button

Return type

OptText.OptionsText

selectable(flag=False)¶

Make the label component not selectable.

This will be done by adding the class CssTextNotSelectable to the component

Parameters

flag – Boolean.

Returns

self to allow the chains

class epyk.core.html.HtmlText.Numeric(report, number, title, label, icon, color, tooltip, htmlCode, options, helper, width, profile)¶
money(symbol='', digit=0, thousand_sep='.', decimal_sep=',', format='%s%v')¶

Format any number into currency

Related Pages:

http://openexchangerates.github.io/accounting.js/

Parameters

  • symbol – String. custom symbol

  • digit – Integer. Number of digit

  • thousand_sep – String. The thousand separator

  • decimal_sep – String. The decimal separator

number(digits=0, thousand_sep=',', decimal_sep=',')¶

Format a number with custom precision and localisation

Related Pages:

http://openexchangerates.github.io/accounting.js/

Parameters

  • digits – Integer. Number of digit

  • thousand_sep – String. The thousand separator

property options¶

Property to set all the possible object for a button

Return type

OptText.OptionsNumber

class epyk.core.html.HtmlText.Paragraph(report, text, color, background_color, border, width, height, htmlCode, encoding, dataSrc, helper, options, profile)¶
property dom¶

Javascript Functions

Return all the Javascript functions defined for an HTML Component. Those functions will use plain javascript by default.

Returns

A Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsHtml.JsHtmlRich

to_word(document)¶
Description:

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

Related Pages:

http://python-docx.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

class epyk.core.html.HtmlText.Position(report, text, color, align, width, height, htmlCode, tooltip, options, profile)¶
digits(flag)¶

Specify if the count should be done from the commas

Parameters

flag – Boolean (default false)

position(index, style)¶

Set the CSS format for a specific character at a given position

Parameters

  • index – Integer. A number

  • style – Dictionary. The CSS Style to be used

class epyk.core.html.HtmlText.Span(report, text, color, align, width, height, htmlCode, tooltip, options, profile)¶
click(jsFncs, profile=False)¶

Add a click event for a component

The event will be automatically added to the onload section to be activated once the component has been build

Usage:

select.label.click(str(rptObj.js.console.log("test")))

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/js/js_htmldom_eventlistener.asp

https://www.w3schools.com/jsref/event_onload.asp

Parameters

  • jsFncs – An array of Js functions or string. Or a string with the Js

  • profile –

Returns

class epyk.core.html.HtmlText.Text(report, text, color, align, width, height, htmlCode, tooltip, options, helper, profile)¶
click(jsFncs, profile=False)¶

Add a click event on the text component. The style of the mouse on the component will be changed to make the event more visible

Parameters

  • jsFncs –

  • profile –

property dom¶

Return all the Javascript functions defined for an HTML Component. Those functions will use plain javascript by default.

Returns

A Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsHtml.JsHtmlRich

editable()¶

Change the componenet properties to be editable if double clicked

Example rptObj.ui.text(“This is a text”).editable()

Returns

Self to allow the chaining

property options¶

Property to set all the possible object for a button

Return type

OptText.OptionsText

to_word(document)¶

Add to the internal document object a word text section

property val¶

Property to get the jquery value of the HTML object in a python HTML object. This method can be used in any jsFunction to get the value of a component in the browser. This method will only be used on the javascript side, so please do not consider it in your algorithm in Python

Returns

Javascript string with the function to get the current value of the component
